name: Unseat, Mythic

sections.body: When you successfully bull rush an opponent off his mount with Unseat, your opponent takes 1d6 points of falling damage per 2 tiers you possess. Items or abilities that reduce falling damage, such as a successful Acrobatics check, can reduce the damage dealt by the impact.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You knock your opponents down from their mounts with frightening concussive force.
